column2: Designed to engage in close range brawls, the 100 ton Berserker debuted in 3056. A 400 rated cXL Engine paired with TSM allows the BRZ-D4 to outrun almost any other heavy or assault grade Mech. A Bombast Laser and 4 Clan ER Medium Lasers make up the Mech’s ranged armament while a colossal 10 ton Hatchet is lethal at close range. Angel ECM and Impact Resistant Armour keep the BRZ-D4 safe as it closes in, 4 Jump Jets provide extra mobility and allow the Berserker to execute lethal DFA attacks; while a head mounted Flamer adds to the Mechs intimidation factor. Quirk: Melee Actuators Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.18

Quirk: Melee Actuators Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.18

column2: Capable of reaching speeds of 87 km/h with it’s MASC activated, the Executioner is a fast 95 ton Clan OmniMech. Powered by a 380 rated XL Engine, the Executioner has 26.5 tons of pod space. The MASC and 4 Jump Jets are hardwired into the chassis. The Executioner EXE-F is armed with a a pair of Large Pulse Lasers and an ER PPC. A Targeting Computer augments the accuaracuy of the weapons while a Supercharger increases the Executioners speed when actiavted. Quirk: Intimidating Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.18 Quirk: Intimidating Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.18

A Targeting Computer augments the accuaracuy of the weapons while a Supercharger increases the Executioners speed when actiavted.\n\nQuirk: Intimidating\n\nDrop Cost Multiplier: 1.18 Quirk: Intimidating Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.18

column2: Capable of reaching speeds of 87 km/h with it’s MASC activated, the Executioner is a fast 95 ton Clan OmniMech. Powered by a 380 rated XL Engine, the Executioner has 26.5 tons of pod space. The MASC and 4 Jump Jets are hardwired into the chassis. The Executioner EXE-G is armed with a Streak LRM-10 and an ER PPC for long range combat. For close range combat, the EXE-G has 6 ER Medium Lasers. Watchdog CEWS cloaks the Mech in a veil of electronic noise and a Targeting Computer enhances the accuracy of the EXE-G’s weapons. Quirk: Intimidating Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.18 Quirk: Intimidating Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.18

column2: Capable of reaching speeds of 87 km/h with it’s MASC activated, the Executioner is a fast 95 ton Clan OmniMech. Powered by a 380 rated XL Engine, the Executioner has 26.5 tons of pod space. The MASC and 4 Jump Jets are hardwired into the chassis. The Executioner EXE-I is armed with a pair of Improved Heavy Large Lasers for long range combat. For close range combat, the EXE-I has 2 Streak SRM-6’s. Guardian ECM cloaks the Mech in a veil of electronic noise, a Targeting Computer enhances the accuracy of the EXE-I’s weapons and a Supercharger increases the EXE-I’s speed while active. Quirk: Intimidating Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.18Quirk: Intimidating Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.18

column2: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
column3: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.

column2: A jack of all trades, the Medium tank is the generic stereotype of a tank. Intended as a scout or vanguard unit, the Medium Tank is constantly on the move, probing ahead of the rest of the troops. Hover: Fast on open ground and water, slow in rough terrain, not very agile. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 8/12 Hex: 240/360 Meters. Armor: Heavy Ferro Structure: Structure Values A S Front 171 25 Left 122 25 Right 122 25 Rear 110 25 Total 525 100
